Joshua Raichur

Passionately curious.

Hi.

I'm Josh, an insatiable learner.

I like  JavaScript.  Ruby on Rails.  exploring.  reading.  design.  observing.  Meteor.  sketching.  coding.  guitaring.  classical music.  illustration.  playing football.  green tea.  animation.  looking up.

I wake up in the morning with a fairly simple daily objective: I want to experience and know more than I had the day before. I'm curious about how the world works, and love solving problems and challenging myself.

Thanks for visiting my little corner of the internet. Want to talk? Send me an email or @me on Twitter.
